mapper.select: select * from cart where member_num = #{memberNum} order by goods_num
mapper.insert: insert into cart (member_num , goods_num, qty ) values (#{memberNum} , #{goodsNum}, '1')
mapper.update: merge into cart c using (select goods_num from goods where goods_num = #{goodsNum}) g on (c.goods_num = g.goods_num and c.member_num = #{memberNum}) when matched then update set c.qty = c.qty+1 when not matched then insert (c.member_num, c.goods_num, c.qty) values (#{memberNum}, #{goodsNum}, 1)
